gig init repo
cd repo
gig add a.txt b.txt
gig commit -m 'Initial commit'

cp ../a2.txt a.txt
rm b.txt

gig diff
cmp stdout ../output.txt

-- repo/a.txt --
one
two
three
-- repo/b.txt --
eins
zwei
drei
-- a2.txt --
one
three
-- output.txt --
diff --git a/a.txt b/a.txt
@@ -1,3 +1,2 @@
 one
-two
 three
diff --git a/b.txt b/b.txt
@@ -1,3 +0,0 @@
-eins
-zwei
-drei
